caption.title: Socio-demographic characteristics of the survey participants.
caption.p: a Total is 338. b Total is 332. c Antillean Guilders, 1 ANG = 0.54 USA dollars and 0.47 EUR. Adapted from: Elsinga J, van der Veen HT, Gerstenbluth I, Burgerhof JGM, Dijkstra A, Grobusch MP, et al. Community participation in mosquito breeding site control: an interdisciplinary mixed methods study in Curacao. Parasit Vectors. 2017;10(1):434.
